reviews.text: Stayed for one night at the above with 2 children. Property recently renovated and very clean. Room itself was fully self contained with kitchenette, microwave etc, plus separate bedroom. Decor nice and bathroom recently updated/repainted. Only downside is some units right next to busy road and can be noisy early evening. Also, complex is no longer under Best Western banner. All in all, a good experience.
reviews.title: NIce Motel, Would stay again
